channel.title: mac on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mac on Blog

item.title: A Story of Switching from Java to Developing for Mac OS X
item.description: A couple of months ago I’ve switched from Java development to developing for Mac OS X. Let me tell you, it’s a completely different world, but that was to be expected. The first thing is to get acquainted with the OS and it’s features. That actually didn’t take too long. I’m really pleased with the availability of a full-fledged UNIX console in the OS, so I’m able to leverage all of my linux knowledge.
